title: Love Me in Dubai - A Contemporary Romance
description: Love Me in Dubai: a standalone romantic comedy in the Mediterranean sea with some steamy scenes  Devastated by her cheating boyfriend, Luisa takes a vacation with her friend Anna: a 20 day cruise from Italy to the United Arab Emirates. She knows she won't be able to trust and love any man ever again. Or will she?Due to the sexual content, this book is not intended for readers under the age of 18. This is a standalone story of some 16,000 words love and passion on cruises Lonely women. Free women. Bored women. Women who want to start a new life. Women who want to smile and laugh and love again. This is “love and passion on cruises” series. Because if you want you can find a new love just round the corner. Or in the middle of the sea...
author: Nelly d'Este
